main event: Three objects were observed in the sky around 800 miles southwest of Hawaii on July 17, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes,The objects were described as having lights, one resembling navigation lights and another like exhaust,The objects were stationary before moving out of sight,The observation was made in conjunction with a B-52 aircraft,The azimuth of the sighting was noted between 220 to 260 degrees.
witness description: Ltjg Laipply, Od D Lt Ike, Na Ens McLennan
